p:
Although the link between SARS-CoV-2 and these multisystem inflammatory syndromes requires further elucidation, there is a growing consensus that this syndrome may represent an immune-mediated complication of SARS-CoV-2 infection in children and adolescents, in light of the presence of SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in most cases and 4-week delay in timing between peaks of community SARS-CoV-2 infections and case report clusters of children presenting with inflammatory syndromes in several locations.
110
,
111
